text: qd kan lakum -ayha alyhwd almtkbrwn almeandwn- dlalt ezymt fi jmaetyn tqablta fi maeraka "badr": jamaeat tuqatil min ajl din allh, wahum muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam washabh, wajamaeat 'ukhraa kafirat ballh, tuqatil min ajl albatl, taraa almuminin fi aleadad mithlayhim ray aleyn, waqad jaeal allah dhlk sbbana lnsr almuslimin elyhm. wallah ywyid binasrih man yasha' min ebadh. 'iina fi hadha aldhy hadath laeizt ezymt li'ashab albsayr aladhin yahtadun 'iilaa hukm allah wafealh
